instructions: You are restricted to upload products more than 10,000
If it facilitates drop down suggestions don't override those values
If you did change product ID ,it ll be added and considered as a new product
Ensure that you have a valid sheet and downloaded by your organisation only
Don't blindly copy text and have to remove any styles or decorations applied on the text
Text fields should be plain text only

product_fields_notes.productId:
Product Id can be alpha numeric Id
Product Id should be unique
Product Id should be less than 10 characters
product_fields_notes.productName: Product name should be greater than 3 characters
product_fields_notes.productDesc: Description should be less than 500 characters
product_fields_notes.price:
Price should be greater than 0
It can be a decimal value
product_fields_notes.minimumAdvertisablePrice: Minimum Advertisable Price value should be greater than 0
product_fields_notes.priceCategory: Pick Price Category value from dropdown suggestion list
product_fields_notes.productType: Pick Product Type value from dropdown suggestion list
product_fields_notes.supplier: supplier should be greater than 3 characters
product_fields_notes.qtyAvailable: Quantity Available should not be less than 0
product_fields_notes.moq: Minimum Order Quantity value value should be greater than 0
product_fields_notes.leadTime: LeadTime value should be greater than 0
product_fields_notes.fromdate: Fomdate value should be date value
product_fields_notes.toDate: To date value should be date value
product_fields_notes.taxClass: Pick Tax Class value from dropdown suggestion list
